info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 7:56AM CDT until April 13 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN HUNT AND SOUTHERN FANNIN COUNTIES... At 756 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bailey, or 11 miles south of Bonham, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Leonard, Honey Grove, Wolfe City, Celeste, Dodd City, Bailey, Bonham State Park, Ladonia, Pecan Gap and Windom. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection stay inside a sturdy structure and keep away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
